Apple Q2 Earnings: 3 Things Investors Should Watch For - Benzinga

Apple, Inc.
is expected to report its fiscal second-quarter earnings on April 28 after the market close. One analyst has listed three important factors Apple investors should be watching in the Apple earnings report.
The Analyst: Bank of America analyst Wamsi Mohan reiterated his Buy rating and $215 price target for Apple.
The Thesis: Mohan said Apple's iPhone sales, buybacks and dividends will be the three key elements of this week's report.

Mohan is also calling for Q2 adjusted EPS of $1.36 on revenue of $92 billion. Both numbers are below consensus analyst estimates of $1.43 and $93.9 billion, respectively.

Mohan is projecting EPS of $5.83/$6.35/$6.82 for Apple in 2022/2023/2024, below consensus analyst estimates of $6.15/$6.55/$6.91. He is projecting revenue growth of 6.1% in 2022 and 7.9% in 2023.

https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/22/04/26768382/apple-earnings-3-things-investors-should-watch-for
